Major AI Developments.title: IIT Indore develops AI-driven system to improve road safety, ease traffic
Major AI Developments.summary: IIT Indore has developed an AI-driven system using C-V2X technology to enhance road safety and traffic management. The system sends real-time alerts about road conditions, accidents, and congestion to drivers via 4G/5G networks. This technology aims to prevent accidents and improve traffic flow by dynamically allocating communication resources.
